body_content.explanation: written or put between the lines of a text:
examples: The manuscript contains a number of interlinear comments.
The poems are printed in a large font with generous interlinear spaces.

body_content.explanation: An interlinear book contains a version of the text in another language written between the lines of the main text:
examples: He is the editor of an interlinear Greek-English New Testament.
They published an interlinear edition of Shakespeare's "Much Ado About Nothing".
